title: NFC toggle missing in new Pixel XL 4
content:
I just picked up the new Pixel 4 XL phone and noticed that when I just started setting the phone up an NFC toggle showed up in the drop down menu, but irrespective of what I did, I couldn't get the NFC to toggle on or off. 

I setup a few credit cards in Android pay and then tried the service and the button just disappeared. Did a full reset and couldn't find the toggle anymore.

Is this bug known or am I dreaming?

I would hate to have to return the brand new phone because of this missing feature.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
